journey.name: findNearbyCafes_withTimeCheck
journey.description: Test finding nearby cafes from the ride detail screen and verifies the ride duration.

actions.action: Wait for the app to find GPS signal
Given the user is on the main dashboard
Click the play button to start a ride and the button turns gray
Click the stop button to end the ride then the button turns gray and play button is white
When the user taps on the 'Trips' tab in the bottom navigation
And the user taps on a specific ride from the list
And the user taps the 'cafe' button on the top right corner of the green map
Then the user sees a list of coffee shops
